text: Gillian B. Loeb is a fictional Batman character in The Dark Knight movies. He was the police commissioner of Gotham City until his death. He was replaced by James Gordon after his death. Loeb blames Batman for every crime in Gotham. He thinks Batman is a criminal. == In other media == Loeb was played by Colin McFarlane in Batman Begins and in The Dark Knight.
